output.sentences: This past week at work we held a charity fundraiser.
The morning started off strong with every one dressed in wacky costumes in good spirit.
Bob tried but failed miserably during his stand-up routine which didn't seem do have any real jokes or sound anything like comedy.
Even after the failed attempt at comedy our organization still was able to raise a lot of money.
In the end it was a success and we got a record number of people to donate to charity.
